name: HistoryOfCABG
title: History of CABG
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Codes indicating history of CABG (coronary artery bypass graft)),(Data Element Scope: CONDITION: CLINICAL_DRIVER:),(Inclusion Criteria: ICD-10-CM and SNOMED CT codes that indicate a patient has had a CABG.),(Exclusion Criteria: Codes for the procedure itself)
